DOC.brief_summary: This study aims at comparing continuous local anesthesia and femoral nerve bloc for total knee arthroplasty in terms of post-operative recovery.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Local Anesthesia Versus Continuous Femoral Nerve Bloc After Total Knee Arthroplasty: Impact on Mean Discharge Aptitude Delay
DOC.criteria: Total knee arthroplasty Age > 18 years with social security covering. Written informed consent Age < 18 years ASA Physical Status > III Body weight < 50 kg Latex or silver allergy. Locoregional anesthesia contraindication Chronic anticoagulant, corticoid or pain treatment. Rivaroxaban or enoxaparin contraindication Communication issues Patient under guardianship Pregnant or breastfeeding patient
